twoSetSkill.name: Anniversary Performance 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Show time shares a common CD of 10s.Ultimate Evasion starts Kiana's Taijutsu, gaining 45% Physical DMG for 5s.Combo ATKs start Mei's Chado Ceremony, healing the host for 30 HP/s for 5s.Being hit by an enemy attack starts Bronya's Shooting Show, with said attack suffering 30% Total DMG Reduction and gaining 25% Attack Speed for 5s.

threeSetSkill.name: Festival 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Gain 15% Max HP and 10% Crit Rate in battle.
